Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.loans

Class Summary
BaseLoanActionForm Base form for forms used to perform operations over a loan
CalculateLoanPaymentsAjaxAction Ajax action used to calculate the payment dates of a multi-payment loan
CalculateLoanPaymentsAjaxForm Form used to calculate loan payments
ConfirmLoanAction Action used to confirm a loan
ConfirmLoanForm Form used to confirm a loan
DiscardLoanAction Action used to discard a loan
DiscardLoanForm Form used to discard a loan
ExportLoanPaymentsToCsvAction Action used to export loan payments to csv
ExportLoansToCsvAction Action used to export loans to csv
GrantLoanAction Action used to grant a loan to a given member or loan group
GrantLoanForm Form used to grant a loan
LoanDetailsAction Action used to retrieve details about a loan
LoanDetailsForm Form used to retrieve details about a loan
ManageExpiredStatusAction Action used to manage an expired loan status
ManageExpiredStatusForm Form used to manage an expired loan status
PrintLoanDetailsAction Used to print a loan details
PrintLoanPaymentsAction Action used to print loan results
PrintLoansAction Action used to print loan results
RepayLoanAction Action used to repay a loan
RepayLoanForm Form used to repay a loan
SearchLoanPaymentsAction Action used to search loan payments
SearchLoanPaymentsForm Form used to search loan payments
SearchLoansAction Action used to search loans
SearchLoansForm Form used to search loans
